original: <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>假癡不癲計謀成功執行！<color=#bceea7>3個月內</color>，偽裝我方武將數<color=#ea301c>減少2成</color>，敵方或掉以輕心前來攻打！(<color=#bceea7>假癡不癲 成功</color>)
text: The <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> strategy of false innocence is successfully executed! <color=#bceea7>Within 3 months</color>, disguise the number of our generals by <color=#ea301c>decrease by 20%</color>, and the enemy may attack lightly! (<color=#bceea7>Successful in idiot but not epileptic</color>)
